subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 23 of his 30 points in the second half, but Rasheed Wallace scored 29 points and Tayshaun Prince had 20 to lead Detroit to a 97-91 victory over Cleveland and a 2-0 lead in the best-of-seven series.
snippet: LeBron James scored 23 of his 30 points in the second half, but Rasheed Wallace scored 29 points and Tayshaun Prince had 20 to lead Detroit to a 97-91 victory over Cleveland and a 2-0 lead in the best-of-seven series.
